website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced, long-sleeved maxi that's basic, beautiful, and practical for numerous occasions.
pros: Soft material provides a comfortable fit
Can be worn for casual and semi-formal occasions
Comes in several fashionable colors, and even has pockets
cons: The dress runs long, and may drag the ground on shorter individuals

customer_reviews.title: Fits by what the measurements indicate.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5” I weight 207 pounds and wear a size 40 D bra. In my normal size clothes I wear size 12 or 14 pants and large and xl shirts. I got a size xl based on the bust size measurements. It fits me perfectly. I will have to wear some small wedges it I can also wear flats and not trip on it or step all over it. It is not clingy on my jiggly belly either. I will be ordering more colors in both short and long sleeves. Perfect dress for casual and date night all depends on the accessories you add.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress super comfy and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 18/20 and ordered an XXL in this dress. Was a little skeptical but was pleasantly surprised! Love this dress super comfy and flattering. Definitely recommend for the curvy woman!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni’s Beatz

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. The material is soft and it fit great. I’m 5’6’’ and the hemline falls perfectly. I wear a 2x so I ordered 2x. It is true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: I love the dress
customer_reviews.text: I love the dress! First time buying a Maxi dress! I never really liked them b/c they seem to be too long to my liking...for some reason this one fit's perfect for my height, I'm 5'4 and i'm a 34 B/36/A the length and sleeves are great! I wear a 8 in dresses and pants and got a Medium in this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staple Wardrobe Dress
customer_reviews.text: I orginallu purchased this dress in a wine color. I loved how perfectly it fit so I got it in black & navy as well. I am 5’3 200lb with 38DDD bust the XL fits wonderfully. I can wear sandals and it doesn’t drag, there is a bit of pulling around my bust but I expect that. The pockets lay flat and are invisible unless I put my hands in them. I like that they don’t bulge out. Easily, a staple dress for all seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Afmccollum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me! I purchased size M- I am 5ft 6 and 136 pounds and most of my clothing is size 6. I wear between S and M shirts and glad I went with M. If you are between sizes or larger chested, go up in size.
customer_reviews.author: bigreader

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured by other reviewers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a L and XL - the shirt sizes that I usually wear. It's not see-through, but it is thin and stretchy, so I'll be wearing a full slip underneath. It is every bit of the dress you see! Order up if you want some shrink/moving room! **photo shows XL**
customer_reviews.author: HappyToBeHere

customer_reviews.title: First it is very comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8” 140 lbs and ordered size M in dark red. First it is very comfortable and fits well. Yes, it came out of the bag wrinkled, but I’m sure a light ironing will smooth the fabric out. I feel the length is perfect, but I am tall. If you are full in the bust, I would suggest a larger size. The fabric is a bit clingy, but the shirt part is full and allows plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: D. Quack

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dress. I got it to wear for our family pictures. I'm 5ft 3" and had to get it hemmed a couple of inches, but otherwise the fit is good. I've got a larger bust and as it stretches it gets a little see-through but it's not terrible. I usually wear a 18/20 and got the dress in XXL. Would buy again, soft, comfy and not clingy. The neck was also stretchy enough for me to nurse in!
customer_reviews.author: Brit Mom

customer_reviews.title: Its super comfortable, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Soooo....I plan to buy this dress in every color. Its super comfortable, fits perfectly, covers my cleavage, and has pockets. What more could you ask for? I really love it. I'm fairly short (5'2") so it's a little long, but not horribly long. Its not tight or uncomfortable in any way, shape or form. Strongly, Highly, Totally recommend getting more than one so if one is in the laundry, you have a spare! Comfy enough to wear lounging around the house and cute enough to wear out to the grocery store and classy enough to wear to a casual dinner.
customer_reviews.author: GinaKay

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRESS ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE this dress. i have 3 different style dresses [black short sleeve long, wine long sleeved long, and wine long sleeved short] from DEARCASE and i love them all. You can dress them up or down. Follow the sizing chart and you can't go wrong. i'm 195lbs, 36DD and buy the XL. the fabric is thin, so i usually wear a tank under, but you may not have to. it's the perfect length; touches the top of my feet. the material is lightweight, soft and EXTREMELY comfortable. You can wear it all day with minimal wrinkles. I wash on cold with like colors and hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and appropriate!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2 and I ordered a large. It fits really well everywhere except for the length, but that was to be expected. I bought this dress to wear to work. I work with small children and this dress is super-appropriate. It is made of a very comfortable material.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Dress is super cute! I’m 5’6 170 pounds and I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Dress is super cute! I’m 5’6 170 pounds and I ordered a Large and it fits perfect the length of the dress will cover my feet, material is soft. Took one star off because the dress had an awful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fits great. Dressed with a statement necklace you can wear to a casual BBQ, birthday party, shopping for the day or even just around the house. I got a XL and it fits great. I'm 5' 5" and about 190. It just touches the floor. I do not find myself tripping on it. I will most likely purchase more
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’9” and about 133 pounds. Because I am tall and don’t like a snug fit, I ordered a large. I love the fit! The hem falls just below my ankles, and the armholes do not cling to my armpits. For a more curvy woman with my height, the hemline will be higher, and the armholes might be tighter. The fabric is stretchy and smooth: very comfortable. It is just thin enough that I will want a slip underneath for wearing the dress outdoors in the afternoon but maybe not for indoors. I do wish that the dress had not been wrinkled from packaging when it arrived. Otherwise, I am completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Q

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. I'm a size 16 and the XL fit perfect...it's just a little too long.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: l LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of buying this dress. I brought the XXL . I tried it on immediately. I was surprised at the fit. I am 5'9" and over 250 lbs..it is actually very complimentary on me.. It's still very long which I love and very soft. I will be ordering a few other colors.. I live a "lazy" dress.. I plan on ordering this is a few other colors and with sleeves for the fall..
customer_reviews.author: Helen Rice

customer_reviews.title: So soft! Not for short girls, though.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing jersey-knit dresses for years. These, however, are so soft and feel so good... They're one of my favorite things to wear, more comfortable than anything else I own. I love the pockets -- they're big enough to hold my phone without fear of it dropping out. They ARE quite long. I'm 5'9", and accustomed to wearing floor-length skirts. This brushes the floor for me. Shorter women, or those not accustomed to "trip-length" skirts, might find it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Blackthorne

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5-star, but the top is a little tight. I usually wear a 12 dress, because I have a large chest and shoulders. I got a Large, and it fits, but it is a little tight on top. Not a huge deal for me, because I'll probably wear a cropped cardigan or a jean jacket over it. If I were to order another, I'd probably size up.
customer_reviews.author: SE Mom

customer_reviews.title: The company was great though. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fit how expected. Very true to size. My only fault with this dress is it’s sheerness. I would be very self conscious if warn on a bright sunny day. I got the light purple short sleeve. The company was great though. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Ruined by the elastic :(
customer_reviews.text: Elastic at the waist was very stiff, and not stretchy, making this very uncomfortable. Back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! I'm a DD and was a little worried how it would fit around the twins, but it was perfect. I'm 5'3 so it is a tad long, but not so long that I can't walk in it. So cute that I ordered the navy blue as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Hello Yellow Comfort & Ease
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XXL and I usually wear 1X or 18W. It fits very well and very flattering. The yellow is more of a mustard - which I don't mind. So comfortable and flattering that I ordered two more colors. The dress is also very long - I am 5'4 and it touches the floor, which I also love. I usually wear heels but even with a low sandal it does not "drag the grown". Wear heels or flats and you are still going to look chic!
customer_reviews.author: Deekitten3

customer_reviews.title: Great dress at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m returning the dress because the bodice is too tight for me (34DD). A bigger size wouldn’t fit well in other places. I’m still giving it 4 stars though because other than that it’s a great dress at a great price! Material is soft; thin but not see through (purple gray). For reference: I’m 5’5”, 137lbs., and 59 yrs old. I think if I were younger I might be fine with the tight bodice. 😜
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. It seems like it fits about a full size smaller than similar dresses from my local department store. But that was the impression I had reading reviews. The length touches the floor and I am 5'10". Perfect for heels! I was skeptical because of the price point but it seems like an excellent buy. The fabric isn't thin but it would definitely be too thin for a truly chilly day. A cardigan and tights or leggings might stretch the seasons you could wear it. I will be interested in seeing how it holds up to regular washing in cold, hung dry.
customer_reviews.author: RN22lr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, a bit long
customer_reviews.text: A bit too long, and I'm 5' 9". Not a problem though. Hold up for stairs or knot at corner(s). Very cute. Only complaint I have is the pattern and cut left a flower with dark blue dot centered on my left spoob. My peeps noticed, but not the worst thing. So...what I did/suggest is wear it backwards! The pockets (which are awesome) work fine, i just cut off little tag and now have a nice medallion centered on my chest instead of a lil Kim pastey looking situation!
customer_reviews.author: shanaynay

customer_reviews.title: Elastic Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress in a medium and large. I have a small waist, but the elastic on it was so tight I could hardly get it over my shoulders. More like tight stitching than elastic. I returned both and was refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L.

customer_reviews.title: And it has Pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten maxi dresses from Dearcase before. I think I have two or three different styles. I love this dress! I have to look professional at work and this paired with either a blazer or a cardigan does the trick. It's very comfortable (which is why I really bought it) and versatile. There's a pretty good chance I'll get it in another color. The dress is a little prettier in person as the color looks a tiny bit more vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Case

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to a wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size large first. It fit quite tight on the top which stretched it and made it a little see-through. So I returned it and exchanged for an XL. This fit much better. I am 5 foot 5 in, 155 lbs. The Xl was about 6 inches too long, dragged on the ground. I ended up quickly hemming it, it fits perfectly now. Very versatile, could be dressed up or down with different accessories. Overall this is a very basic dress that will get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic221979

customer_reviews.title: Versatile dress!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile dress that can be dressed up or down! I’m 5’4’’ and 230lbs with a large chest. The dress was long enough to wear with heels. I wore it for an anniversary dinner date and paired it with a cardigan and belt. The only issue is that the dress puckers out a little where the pockets are but that’s likely because I am curvy. I would buy this again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Washington

customer_reviews.title: Colors were different
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the colors. In the pictures they appear to be more pastel but they are very vibrant on the actual dress and the flowers are more of the dark red than the light pink. So it doesn’t match the dress I bought for my daughter to wear in our family pictures. The dress fits - I actually accidentally ordered the Large instead of Medium. It’s loose but not too loose and the length is pretty good. It’s pretty and soft so I’m keeping it but wish the coloring was different. I’m 5’6, 30 weeks pregnant, and about 170 pounds just so you can compare size wise.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: Dress is very pretty and soft. Washes nicely.bi ordered the XL bc that was all that was available in the dress I wanted. It fits great in the chest area ( 38 D ) but is alittle long for my 5'3" frame. I had to wear 3.5 inch shoes and it was still on the floor. But I wanted this design so I am okay with the length. Will definitely order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but beware of chest material
customer_reviews.text: I put this dress on and my fiance immediately exclaimed, "Wow!". However, when I looked in the mirror, I noticed that the fabric around the chest looks almost transparent when stretched to fit your body. Keep in mind, I'm 5'5" with size A bordering B boobs, so it's not like I'm exactly exploding in the top. However, when stretching around the boobs, the material got lighter and made it look see through (even though it was just the stretch of the material). Because I'm a teacher and hoping to wear it to school, I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute; fits well; could be better quality
customer_reviews.text: First off, I really do love this dress. It's cute, comfy, flowy, and fits just as I expected. The only downfall that after the first wear, the dress formed lots of little pills. I wore my purse with it all day, which is a cross-body bag. This caused the front of the dress, right in the chest area where the strap of my bag came across, to create little pills from the friction. I would buy this dress again, but I caution buyers to beware of wearing it for extended periods with a purse or bag, or long periods of time in the car wearing a seat belt.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look and fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and I have to admit. I am not a fan of long dresses normally. BUT this looked absolutely amazing on her. We have bought many versions of this dress now in different colors and they all fit nicely and look amazing. the oldest one is of a year old now and washed and dried regularly, holding up just fine. I highly recommend these to any man wanting to surprise his better half (Yes, Better) with a gift that is not all about seeing how much skin he can see. You will be glad you did guys.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was my first clothing purchase from Amazon and all the reviews were correct. I love it. It is sewn well and the fabric is soft and light. I am 5'6 and the dress just barely touches the ground. Having deep pockets are a nice touch. I received many compliments and i plan to get it again. P.S. I ordered it in red, and the first time i wore it (without washing it) i was caught in the rain. I was soaked and the die DID NOT come off on my skin or the my cream cloth car interior. Thank the lord!!
customer_reviews.author: vpoe

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,not see through, fits well
customer_reviews.text: I got a size small. I’m 5’3 and 25 weeks pregnant and it was the perfect maxi length. It’s simple and easy to dress up or down. I’d purchase more if there were more short sleeve color options
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to keep it but too see-through
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to keep this dress -- I got the purple and loved the color, and the length was perfect, just skimming the top of my feet. Sadly, the bust was see-through -- I bought it for work, but it was bad enough that I couldn't even wear it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: fit, fabric, failure.
customer_reviews.text: The dress I bought ran very small. I wear a 14 and the XL was beyond tight. But more disappointing than the fit was the quality of the fabric. Although very soft, it is EXTREMELY thin. Without even putting it on, you could see through it. Once it was on, because of the snug fit you could see directly through the fabric! And the soft fabric is super clingy (bra, panties, little leg hairs). I am returning this item. And I'm pretty sad, I really wanted it to work!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramp

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but a bit long- 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 200lbs. I wear flats mostly. This dress was very long and I ended up paying to get it hemmed a few inches. I ordered an XL and the fit is perfect! Very stretchy, breathable fabric and has pockets that fit your whole hand! I have washed it once using cold water gentle cycle and let it air dry laying over my stairway railing. It still looks very bright and wrinkle free! I may order this dress again in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Emily E

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this and I do like how the top fits, but its awkward everywhere else. The banding digs in at the back and hits at a weird spot. It's also kind of itchy. I thought I'd like the pockets, but they make me look super hippy and they arent accessible if you wear a sweater with it. I love the color, but it just isnt for me.
customer_reviews.author: Movieluver

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I didn’t expect a lot, but this dress is awesome! The fabric is not too thin, and it drapes very nicely. And it has POCKETS!! I’m thrilled and have immediately ordered two more in different colors. I’ll be traveling quite a bit this summer and these maxis are going to be right there with me! FYI ON FIT, I’m 5’3” and will either need heels or to have it hemmed. But that’s always the case for me on maxi dresses.
customer_reviews.author: cellis

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10 so I struggle with clothing length. I could wear a medium but ordered a large for the length. It's right at my ankle. It's a pretty color and overall is a decent dress. My only complaint is the material is very thin. I ordered the bluish-green color. You HAVE to wear a slip which I hate, and the top you can see my bra so I had to wear a cardigan. If it was thicker material I would get several in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty,  comfortable & reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors & the feel of the material. Very soft. Pockets are an added bonus. Seems well made. I think I may even purchase another color, same style. Very hot this time of the year & I like wearing dresses as opposed to pants when I am lounging around my home. Going on vacation soon & I think paired with some sandals will make a cute beachy outfit for an evening stroll on the boardwalk. I am 5'10", 208 lbs. And the 2x size I purchased accommodates my size. Maybe a tad tighter in the chest area but I am on a weight loss plan & this dress will fit for quite a few more pound losses!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Herring

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this dress. Cute alone and easily dressed up. The pockets are a little bulky and it's too long on me but I'm 5'1", everything is too long. For reference my measurements are 38, 29, 42 and I weigh 152 lbs. I carry most of my weight on my bottom and thighs. The fabric is nice and thick, soft and it's incredibly comfortable. For me, I wouldn't wear it mid-summer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mostly disliked the white circle of the pattern being directly over my breast which made it look like a bullseye. I did like the neckline which covers nicely but being a breast cancer survivor I’m self conscious about bring attention to my prosthetics. I thought about wearing it backwards but I also will have to hem a good bit of it up and the top portion is very snug and I’m afraid to dry it. I may need to just return it. I really hate that. If the pattern was lined up better I would probably keep it and hem it and just not dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress. I am 6ft & 200 curvy lbs. This dress is very lightweight and perfect for summer. I threw on a black shrug with the yellow (more mustard colored) dress and got many complements. The dress hits me just at the ankle. It skims the body and flows nicely. For the price, you just can't beat it. Will be ordering more colors. Definitely made for the taller, not so busty woman. Love, Love, LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2xl fit
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these dresses, one is a long sleeve (my favorite) and they fit perfectly. I'm a size 18 apple, 42DDD and 5'4". The dresses do sweep the floor, but with the right shoes, it isn't an issue. The chest is somewhat sheer, but not provocative (happens with big boobs). They accentuate the hips beautifully, I think the pockets help with that. Not a fan of my arms showing, but the short sleeves cover just enough. I will continue to buy these until I have every pattern and color, long and short sleeve. By far the most comfortable dresses I own. Can be dressed up or down. Highly recommend to all shapes.
customer_reviews.author: MouniMou

customer_reviews.title: Feel so confident in it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! It's versatile- dress up or down, and fits perfectly. I'm 5'7 180lbs (large bust), no hips. I love that it has an elastic band under the bust and a bit of ruching to hide a belly, and falls flat. It's so comfortable, too! It doesn't cling, it's airy, and actually slimming. My husband complimented me several times. I bought the black and will be purchasing other colors.
customer_reviews.author: michelle k.

customer_reviews.title: See through. Why??
customer_reviews.text: Who decided that women want their dresses to be made out of see through material? I ordered the dark green in hopes that it wouldn’t be see through and was very disappointed. I held the dress up and could make out my husband’s face through the fabric. If anyone can recommend a company that makes dresses that are not see through please let me know. I am starting to think it is hopeless.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dress. I have about 5 of them. I love the two tone look and this did not disappoint. It is not see through. For reference, I am 12-14 in jeans and large busted, usually an XL in shirts. XL for perfectly. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenE

customer_reviews.title: True to size, a little long though
customer_reviews.text: Love this soft fabric, when it first arrived! However, once washed 2 or more times the fabric pills and appears thinner. It has shrunk up some, but not too much. Its definitely worth the <$20 price tag though with some cute accessories, it can be dressed up and with less dressed down. Great for family photos. I am 5'1'' and 200lb, I ordered the XL for pregnancy pictures and was still able to wear post partum because it shrunk up some.
customer_reviews.author: upperleft

customer_reviews.title: Get a much larger size
customer_reviews.text: This dress was crazy small in the bust/waist! I ordered a size larger than the size chart and it was still insanely uncomfortably tight. I was able to return for two sizes bigger (i’m around 120 lbs and 5’5” and usually wear a small. I had to get a large!) Material is super soft and comfy and had to chop off a ton and hem it due to it dragging the ground. Not a big deal. Worth the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I ordered more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this dress! I loved it so much that I ordered the wine colored one. Light weight, easy flow, super comfortable, and love the pockets!! Thinking about ordering more! Lots of compliments from others on both of the dresses, but I honestly would wear them even if I didn’t receive the compliments. Only caution: I’m 5’11” and the black dress touches the floor on me. The wine one shoes the tips of my toes. If you are vertically challenged, order this dress and have it hemmed. You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Shasteen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love so many things about this dress. I love that it's a little stretchy and forgiving. I love the pockets. I love the short sleeves. I love that it's long enough to tie up the bottom if I want to, but not WAY too long to keep it flowing. I am 5'5" and 160 lbs and ordered a medium. It fits great. Love that I can dress it up or dress it down. Really good for the price. I only gave it 4 stars because the top is a little thin, which makes it necessary for me to wear a layer over even a black bra. Other than that, it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R

customer_reviews.title: Bodice is small.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this dress as the bodice was too tight. The material was soft and flowing but emphasized the stretch at the bust. It saddened me, the color was lovely and it would have been perfect for cruise wear. I tried a Large, based on the reviews but had to exchange for an X-large. It was still too tight in the bust and even longer. Gemming would have been easy but there’s nothing to be done to remedy the too tight bustline.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a summer maxi dress. Was drawn to the design. Fits well. Love that it has pockets. Pockets not meant to carry anything heavy due to the lightweight material but it is nice to be able to rest your hands in them. Color is slightly lighter than what is pictured. Dress is about 1-2 inches too long on me but not a deal breaker. With heels it's probably perfect, but if worn with sandals, you might have to hold one side up a bit to keep from stepping on/dragging. I'm keeping it. I'm 5'4" and weigh 142 lbs. I bought the medium. Other than the length, the fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Get it it’s so perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The record men’s size from amazon was a large. I chose an extra large. I’m 5’4” and about 185 pounds. I knew it might be a bit long and it is but I am able to hem it. I wore it the first time and tied a knot at the bottom so it didn’t drag or get stepped on. I’m so happy with this dress and the fit. The color is perfect and the material is super soft. I don’t love dressed because I carry my weight in my stomach and this was still very flattering. I will buy another and definitely it would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected/described
customer_reviews.text: Dress showed up and is WAY too short. It’s not even close to floor length, it hardly comes to my mid shin. Company offered me a 50% refund since the dress was only $10. I have the long sleeve version but this was a totally different dress.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Looks small but very stretchy material
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this beautiful navy blue maxi dress today. I was hesitant at first. It looked really small. I’m a 2x size 18/20 and Apple shaped body. It fit perfectly. I did wear my suck in spandex with it to give it an all around smooth look. It’s a very stretchy and clingy material but works well. I received multiple compliments on the dress and how it made me look slimmer. I love this dress and I’m ordering another one. PS: see my photo.
customer_reviews.author: AuntGigi

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Dress is a light weight making it comfortable for warm weather. Perfect fit across bust and hips. I'm 5'7" and 200lbs. The XL fits comfortably without tugging. Material is soft and a little stretchy. Length goes to my ankles. Got the burgundy with flowers. Very pretty and overall look is feminine and flattering to my curvy figure. I intend to buy other colors. I think hand wash or delicate would be a good idea to keep it from snagging. Its really pretty and I don't like snags or pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2, 135 lbs and the medium fits perfect. I normally wear medium bottoms and 8-10 dress size. I washed it on a delicate cycle and dried on a normal cycle and it shrunk a little bit in length, which was fine for me because it’s still about an inch too long. It does wrinkle easily but a quick tumble in the drier and it’s perfect. This is great for casual wear or it can be dressed up with a pair of low heels and jewelry. It’s a staple in my summer wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual dress
customer_reviews.text: I liked the all-over design of this turquoise geo fabric rather that the 2-tone style because the horizontal top/skirt seam can hit anywhere between empire to waist and not matter. Fabric is a nice weight to wear and packs neatly. I am 5'7", long-waisted and usually wear a 10/medium. But from reading other reviews, I bought an x- large and it hangs flowy, not tight and almost touches the floor which is want I wanted to wear with a wedge-heel sandal. I could have probably gotten into a large but guessed it would have been too snug. I don't get too hung up on on-line sizes, I just want a good fit - very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chi Chick - USA

customer_reviews.title: Cute but super cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I love the cut, I love the color, I really like how it looked!! But I literally wore it for 2 hours for family pictures, and the material was already peeling across the chest area. Fabric should last longer than 2 hours before showing signs of where. Really unfortunate, because everything else about it was fantastic. Also I got the olive green color and you could see my leopard print bra through the olive green material. That should give you an idea of how thin the material was.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Just My Size!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying clothing from Amazon because I am 5ft 11in tall and it's hard to find clothing that is long enough for me. I was pleasantly surprised when I unfolded the dress and the hem hit the floor. This dress is long. It touches the top of my feet long. I was expecting for it to fall a little above my ankle based on the other reviews I saw. So happy that this dress exceeded my expectations. I ordered a size medium because that's the size I normally wear in dresses. The dress fit like a medium should fit. I am sooooo excited about ordering more dresses in other colors from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Wowmom

customer_reviews.title: I love these dresses!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these dresses. Two were 3/4 sleeves and 2 were long sleeves. I decided to try the short sleeve version in lavendar. It fits fine. I am 5'7 and weigh 115 and usually wear 0-2. Unfortunately, the dress arrived with a small scissor slice in the front. I called Amazon and got a return label and will re-order the dress again. It is a very comfortable style . Not too thin. I love the pockets! Excellent price for a dress than can be very casual with sandals, or dressed up with heels. If you are thinking about purchasing this dress, it is a good deal ( unless there is a defect).
customer_reviews.author: Penny Velie, ARNP

customer_reviews.title: I got lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress! (I also bought a black one.) I have washed and dried it in the machines and it holds up pretty good. It did shrink a little lengthwise, but that was OK because it hit the floor prior to washing and now it’s just hits top of my feet. I’m 5”7’. The colors are vibrant and I got many compliments. It is rather long though, so I wouldn’t recommend for someone petite. I believe they sell the same design in knee length, so that may be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much I got 4 different colors in ...
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these dresses. I liked them so much I got 4 different colors in them. They are so nice and hide all the parts of me I don't like. I have recommended these to others who have complimented me and they have bought them as well. Seriously, amazing dress. You can make it fancy or have it every day wear. I LOVE them. I am not the dress-wearing type, but I caved in and was sure glad I did. For this price, the size fits as expected and it's completely worth the money. I literally almost bought every color! You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GINA HERRERA

customer_reviews.title: Mostly a great dress...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this dress. I’m saving it for Easter but it fits nicely. My only complaint is the where the elastic in the empire waist hits. It needs to be about a 1/2” higher. I’m keeping it because of the price but I may see if I can alter it so it comes up higher. The length is good and I LOVE the pockets. I’m 5’4” and got a small.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiianbird

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute, Comfy, Cheap Dress!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dress to wear to my annual St. Patrick's Day party, and I know I am going to enjoy it! It is a lovely shade of green, fits just fine, and will look dressy with my pretty apron. I also think it is a good beach cover-up, a nice dress to wear to brunch with my jean jacket. I really like it, and may buy another! I was skeptical of buying clothing on Amazon, of course, but you can't go wrong with this dress. I was surprised and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I loved this dress. I wore it once, and recieved lots of compliments. It's floor length, and fits perfect. I washed it one time, on gentle, and hung it up to dry. I put it on this morning, and it now has lots of spots where the fabric has worn so thin that it is see-through. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer koontz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The length of this dress is perfect! I'm 5'7 and I usually have a hard time finding a maxi dress that falls where I want it to. This dress is like your favorite soft t-shirt in a maxi dress form. It looks fantastic with a long pendant necklace or lightweight scarf. I will definitely buy this dress in one or two more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dessie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress is pretty, flattering and very comfortable! Every time I wear it I get tons of compliments from random strangers even. And it feels like you're wearing a nightgown but it's somehow the perfect amount of dressy for any occasion. I have worn it out to casual things and to work to be in a Court room. I will buy more! My only complaint is that I'm a bit short (5'4"-size large) and it's difficult to wear flats with it. I make it work but it's really a better length for heels at my height.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Dress! Very wearable.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile! This is an excellent layering dress that travels well. Pair it with scarves and sweaters and jackets and it becomes a different outfit. My only complaint is the pocket placement. The pockets hit at the widest part of the hips and create a small bulge if they don't sit properly. The pockets are also the same fabric as the dress, so any weight in them will definitely change the silhouette - and not for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: I'm also only 5'3 so of course it's long but i like the material (its a little forgiving for my rolly ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm about a 44DDD and it's snug but that is usually the case so major complaints. I'm also only 5'3 so of course it's long but i like the material (its a little forgiving for my rolly polly ollies (yep, that's what i call them) and I will always be grateful for pockets on dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Toya B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I will be spending a lot of time in this dress this Summer and even into the Fall with a cardigan or jean jacket. It had a very flattering fit, emphasizing the chest but skimming over the middle. I like having a little upper arm coverage sometimes, and I LOVE that it has pockets. I’m 5’5, and I need just a little bit of a heel or wedge to keep it from brushing the floor. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks lovely on
customer_reviews.text: At first glance I didn't think I'd like it. The material felt thin and cheap, but when I tried it on, the fit was fabulous and it looked lovely on! I am 5'3" 150lbs and bought a size L, it is a foot too long. I'll hem up or tie up and happy to keep it! I'd recommend, but warn you that it is extra long in the large size anyway (but I'm short too!)
customer_reviews.author: J R n Texas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress and color, bit snug
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely dress! But it was a bit snug on the bottom. I bought the largest size for my daughter who is a size 22 on top and a 24 on the bottom. The top fit her. Tight, but she was happy with the way it looked. The bottom was a bit too snug. So we returned it. But not because there is anything wrong with it. It's beautiful! She didn't like that it was too tight on her but and all her lumps showed, which I totally understand!
customer_reviews.author: Lannah

customer_reviews.title: Too Thin- See Through
customer_reviews.text: I am 5,3 and 175 lbs a large fit. The problem is that the material is so shear that when you are out in the sun people can see underwear through the dress (I tested this out). The fit across the chest (D) was a too thin as well. you could see the entire outline shell of my bra as well as my skin. Since I am 5'3, the dress did hit the floor and drag by about 1/2-1 inch. Anyway, I will be returning since I am a teacher and I can't have see through clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Janke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, well fitting dress
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable dress. I needed something comfortable to wear on video conferencing calls while at home. I know some people only worry about the waist up but I may need to get up or the computer fall, etc. Best to be prepared. Anyway, this dress is perfect for that and if I need to leave the house, I just put my shoes on and then m ready to go. It is a little long. I’m 5’4” and it goes to the floor but that doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress and buying another!
customer_reviews.text: I got this dress yesterday, a friend had bough one and I loved how it looked on her. I tried it on and love the soft stretchy material, I'm almost 24 weeks pregnant and was hoping I could find some dresses to wear to work especially when the weather warms up more. I live in Wisconsin. I'm 5'7, 38B and usually wear about an 18-20 at this time. It fits beautifully with room to grow with my bump. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This dress fits very nicely and is super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This dress fits very nicely and is super comfortable. It is, however, really long. I’m 5’8” and 215 lbs. This was a nice cool dress, by u can tell the fabric isn’t going to last long. A loose string already got caught on my shoe and pulled the hem loose. And I got something on it and realized how quickly it pills. I will just have to take very gentle care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amznmom

customer_reviews.title: Love these dresses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these dresses, I bought two different colors and I love them, they look great! I wore them while pregnant and I’m still wearing them eight months postpartum and they look beautiful still. The white one with flowers is a little see through but if you wear skin colored undergarments it’s unnoticeable. They have pockets and they still look new after washing many times. I wear flat shoes and the dresses hit the ground. I wear mine to work as they are conservative and business casual.
customer_reviews.author: Karli L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dress
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dress, I won’t be ordering more though. I purchased the black floral pattern I. A large. My usual size. Size 12- 36c chest and curvy. The shape is great for my curves and I feel pretty when I’m wearing it. My main issues are with the long length And the shear ness of the fabric- even in black you can kinda see my black bra. I also got a tear in the dress while knotting it, which I have to do bc it’s so long. The tear is kinda my fault, kinda not. I might sew it or just make that area my go to knot spot. ??
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D

customer_reviews.title: I don’t mind....
customer_reviews.text: So happy that I purchased this maxi dress and will be purchasing more for the spring and summer months! I am 5’6 and 145lbs and ordered a size medium. I probably could have order a small but was worried that the length would be too short. The medium length touch the floor without shoes which okay with me. It is very comfortable material. It is thin but I don’t mind wearing a slip or girdle : )
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer dress
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! I’m 5’ 9, 155 lbs, B cup, and I bought a medium. It’s perfect for summer! I tied the bottom in a knot and it’s nice and breezy. When it’s not tied it flows just above my ankles. The dark green color isn’t sheer at all. I love that I can wear it to the beach or to church.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Dress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Product came in the mail and was delivered within 3 days. It came in a separate plastic bag. I ordered the army green color and liked it a lot. The fabric seems light, but fairly durable and was not see through. And it has pockets!! Hallelujah for people putting pockets in things ha. I'm 5'8", 160lb, 34D and ordered a medium. Fit is great! Just a little shy of hitting my feet in length (I'm 5'8"). If you're wondering what size to buy, I'd recommend going with the bust measurement, just because that seems to be where the dress is the most tight. Everywhere else it's pretty loose. Overall I'd say a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meggers 92

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this dress! It came yesterday (super quick shipping). I bought the wine red to wear as handmaid costume for Halloween but also because I can wear this dress to work. I wore it today with a long necklace and will be shopping for belts as well. I teach third grade and this dress was so comfortable. I also received many compliments from my students and other teachers today. I was so happy with it I ordered two more when I got home and one for my daughter as well. I'm hoping the other colors fit as well as the wine red and the small fits my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Flattering for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking about get this dress, do it! I’m a pear shaped plus-size and it’s not always easy to find flattering dresses. I usually shy away from the clingy materials, but I’m glad I took a chance on this one. This dress is super comfortable and does not feel cheap at all. If you have a large chest like me(44D) the material does tend to stretch and get somewhat see though, but not enough to put something under it. I purchased a 2xl and it fit perfectly! I’ll definitely be buy it in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: kara smith

customer_reviews.title: Go For It My Curvy Ladies.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love dresses like this. Maxi spandex dresses are my thing. This dress feels comfy, and it falls nicely on my curvy body. Because Im a shorty its a little long, easy fix. Definitely worth the money. I want more colors. I bought a size XXL; I’m 46 Bust; 39 Waist; 50 Hips. Enjoy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: VMaryH

customer_reviews.title: Weird when it gets wet and too long for flats
customer_reviews.text: This dress is very comfortable. The fabric has a nice stretch. I have this in two colors, army green and white floral. Be careful not to get the army green wet while you are wearing it. If you get splashes of water, or need to clean off a spot it will dry lighter and you can see it all day. It comes out fine in the wash, but looks weird until you wash it. Also, it is long. I am 5'3 and I can't get away with this unless I wear platform style wedges. That is a cute look, but I will need to have it hemmed if I want to wear it with more casual flats.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: I said yes to this dress - TWICE
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress!! Shortly after receiving it I got a notification saying it was on a lightening deal and ordered another color without hesitation! I’m 5’4” and weigh 200-205 pounds, an XL fits very comfortably on me. Skirt comes right down to brush the floor. I like that the sleeves aren’t too short, the fabric is comfortable, and the print doesn’t look cheap. Definitely fully worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: I Am Buying This In Every Color - NO JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7, 150 lbs, and I wear a 38D bra....the Large fits me perfectly and isn't too long. It skims the my ankle/top of my foot area. I work from home, so this dress is PERFECT for me - - comfy enough where it really feels like pj's, but it's a nice dress, so if I need to run out and meet a client or go pick up groceries, I'm not sporting my (usual) yoga pants and tunics. When I find clothing items like this, I tend to buy them in EVERY COLOR. I am going to have to do that with both the short and long sleeve versions of this dress.
customer_reviews.author: Deenie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on this dress every time I wear it. It’s a little tight in the bust but I’m larger busted. I’m only 5 ft 3 and it’s to the floor almost but not dragging. I wear wedges with it. Absolutely love the pockets. Best thing man ever created was dresses with pockets. I teach and West it to work. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Wasame

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just right. I went with my gut and preferred a LARGE. I am 5’8” and 158lbs and well last I checked 36DD but I’m currently nursing so I’d say a bit bigger now. I always worry about how things will fit in the chest. This fits perfect! Length just barely hits the floor and the waist is a little loose so I’m happy with that. I will mention that I assumed the green color was like a hunter green but it’s actually more like a very dark teal. I’m actually ok with this color even though it’s not what I wanted. Will order in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: It is quite long
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 180 lbs. It fits around me great, is a lovely color, very stretchy and loose flow, so really very comfortable, but.... it touches the ground. I'll just wear it around the house anyway, but I'm surprised that it is so long as these things usually run short! I would love to order one for my sister, but I am afraid to because she is bigger around than me but 2 or 3 inches shorter. :(
customer_reviews.author: BMore

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: The material is so soft and feels quite comfortable. I was hesitant about the size so ordered X-large but returned in for a large and it fit just right. It is long for someone 5'3" but I am use to cutting off part of the dress and hemming to fit. Would recommend this dress and in the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: baileygirl

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I usually wear XL, and bought this dress in that size, but it was uncomfortably snug. I have at least 10 maxi dresses, which are without question, the most comfortable and figure forgiving apparel I own. The XXL is long enough, looks and makes you feel attractive and comes in an assortment of colours. I would highly recommend this garment, but order one size larger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fits great, feels good
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a wedding while I was pregnant. Finding a formal plus size maternity dress was harder then I thought it would be so I got this instead and put a navy lace cardigan over it. It fit perfectly over my large belly and looked great. I ended up using it for maternity photos as well. Now that I'm no longer pregnant it still fits well. The dress is pretty comfortable too. I'm quite happy with the dress and all the use I'm getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Flattering on this plus size girl
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and 285 lbs.... I ordered this dress and I love the fit! It is a little tight in the bust, but I have that problem in most dresses and usually it is a deal breaker, but not on this dress. This dress is very comfortable too. I wore it to an outdoor wedding in central Texas and it was breathable fabric... all around a win and I’m ordering another in a different pattern after I post this.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L.

product_meta.title: DEARCASE Women Short Sleeve Loose Plain Maxi Dresses Casual Long Dresses with Pockets
feature_bullets: Attention:The floral print is random,we couldn't guarantee the position of floral print on each dress,but they are definitely made of same pattern fabric.Fabric:95% Rayon+5% Spandex,Super soft, stretchy and lightweight,Can be easily dress up or dress down
Features: Casual Style,Two Side Pockets,Short Sleeves,Round Neck,Floor Length,Elastic at Waist,Not lined,Maxi Dresses
Model is 5'5'', 32 B bust, size 2/4 pants, size small top and is wearing a size small.
Approx. Length (shoulder to hem): -Small: 54.7" - Medium: 55.5" - Large: 55.9" - X-Large:56.7" - XX-Large:58.3"
